My Friends 2

My friend Mike was a great reader so I asked him to read over my written work

I knew nothing about the subject she was studying, but I knew that some of the sentences in her essay didn’t make sense and some of the bits were really boring and could be changed around, so I told her that’

(Mike)

Friends might support you in the following ways:

Encouragement when you need it

Reading over your written assignments before you submit them

Know-how with computers

Knowledge of higher education and how it works
